Authentication¶

All API requests (except listed on this page) should be sent including authentication http header:

  • X-Auth-Token: <auth_token> received from /cloudml/auth/authenticate resource
Method Resource Description
POST /cloudml/auth/get_auth_url Get oauth redirect url
POST /cloudml/auth/authenticate Authenticate
POST /cloudml/auth/get_user Get current user info

Get oauth redirect url¶

  • Method: POST
  • URL: /cloudml/auth/get_auth_url

Response Parameters¶

  • auth_url - OAuth url for redirect to

Authenticate¶

  • Method: POST

  • URL: /cloudml/auth/authenticate

  • POST params:
    • oauth_token: token received from oDesk
    • oauth_verifier: token received from oDesk

Response Parameters¶

  • auth_token - API auth token to use in API requests
  • user - Current user info

Get current user info¶

  • Method: POST
  • URL: /cloudml/auth/get_user

Response Parameters¶

  • user - Current user info
